title: 9. Succinylcholine
description:
Hey babies! It's the 9th episode! Wow. In today's discussion, Chris talks about Peter Thomas, the late voice actor and narrator of Forensic Files. Also discussed: meeting Sinbad, female traffic lights, and bad commercials where people laugh whimsically. Chris also makes a pitch to Tide Detergent to let him write, direct, and star in a commercial.
Tweet your questions and spread the love using the hashtag #congratulationspod on Twitter and everywhere else.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
